title: Issues with the mobile payment option.
body: I don't know why this happened but I was about to make a purchase using the trusted " Mobile Payment" option in the riot store and I clicked on it typed in my phone number knowing its only available to Sprint and/or Verizon users, but after I clicked continue ready to get my 5 dollars worth of riot points and for it to be billed to my account on Verizon it just said something like Riot Games isn't available for Verizon and I was like "WHAT?!" just because I have made payments this way before and just the other day I did and it worked fine I don't know if its a server issue or your taking Verizon off the plan. I just want my Riot points to buy the Blood Moon Yasuo skin...

replies.body:
I think its a bug still, because on the initial screen, before you enter your number, it still posts that only Verizon and Sprint users are able to use the service. 

Plus, I would assume that Riot would have mentioned this in a post if that is the case about no longer supporting Verizon users.

It doesn't look like League supports Verizon payments any longer, due to a decision made between Verizon and Boku. If you want more details as to why this happened, reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). 

In the meantime, go ahead and take a look over our [**payment methods faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203701590) for other ways to get that RP!

I just had the same issue. I purchased RP just a few days ago with my Mobile Payment through Verizon, but not its saying "Sorry, Riot Games is not available for Verizon Wireless."

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
